insert into golden_message (createTime, `createUser`, createUserId, deleted, departmentId, departmentName, proNo, `state`, title, `type`, proId, receiveUser, createUserAndName, typeMsg) values (#{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{departmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{departmentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prono,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{proid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receiveuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuserandname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typemsg,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update golden_message set createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `createUser` = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createUserId = #{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, departmentId = #{departmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, departmentName = #{departmentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proNo = #{prono,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, proId = #{proid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receiveUser = #{receiveuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createUserAndName = #{createuserandname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, typeMsg = #{typemsg,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, createTime, `createUser`, createUserId, deleted, departmentId, departmentName, proNo, `state`, title, `type`, proId, receiveUser, createUserAndName, typeMsg from golden_message where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
